author: amaltaro
body:
This release contains two bugfixes on top of what is running in production right now (1.3.4.pre2).
As discussed over gtalk @muhammadimranfarooqi , we will run a cmsweb-testbed deployment with this, if everything is okay, we will then push this to cmsweb production as well (likely in the form of code patching).
title: Production hotfix for reqmon - stale views
